welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zgornja Kungota, a charming city nestled in the Slovenian countryside! Known for its beautiful hills and charming vineyards, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its unique charm."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maribor International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maribor International Airport, used for handling freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thalerhof Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Thalerhof Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
